title: Won a series but it says I just qualified for a series ...
body:
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=swaggerishly%20swa
OK
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  
So i just won a series 2-1
Wins
{{champion:107}} Rengar:14/5/18
{{champion:120}} Hecarim:12/5/7
Losses
{{champion:104}} Graves:8/10/4

 I "won" the series and should have been promoted to Bronze II, yet it said that I qualified for a series again.
{{item:3070}} Is this a glitch or did League just not update{{item:3070}} 
Note: I was duo queing with a friend ...
No idea if this would change the outcome since I was playing on ranked: Solo/Duo  
Thanks {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you **dodged** a match during your promo series. Any dodges during a promo series count as a loss and negate any *Promo Helper* effects.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I didn't even get a free win{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
